item.title: Uninstall hasn't detected folder of JetBrains Rider installation
item.description: 今天在卸载 Rider 程序（运行 Uninstall.exe 程序）时，遇到找不到卸载程序的错误。 完整错误提示为：Uninstall hasn't detected folder of JetBrains Rider installation. Probably uninstall.exe was moved from the installation folder，看上
